label: uncl8335
comment: Code specifying a type of movement.

values.label: Breakbulk
values.comment: Defines the movement of general cargo not carried in ISO standard containers.

values.label: LCL/LCL
values.comment: Defines the movement of cargo packed in and unpacked from containers by the carrier on behalf of the shipper/consignee. 'LCL' means Less than Container Load.

values.label: FCL/FCL
values.comment: Defines the movement of cargo packed by the shipper or shipper's agent and unpacked by the consignee or consignee's agent. 'FCL' means Full Container Load.

values.label: FCL/LCL
values.comment: Defines the movement of cargo packed by the shipper or shipper's agent and unpacked by the carrier. 'FCL' means Full Container Load. 'LCL' means Less than Container Load.

values.label: LCL/FCL
values.comment: Defines the movement of cargo packed by the carrier and unpacked by the consignee or consignee's agent. 'LCL' means Less than Container Load. 'FCL' means Full Load.

values.label: Consolidation
values.comment: A movement of multiple shipments to a single destination.

values.label: Parcel post
values.comment: A movement of material by parcel post.

values.label: Expedited truck
values.comment: A movement of material by expedited truck.

values.label: Consignor determined means
values.comment: A movement of material by the means determined by the consignor.

values.label: Private parcel service
values.comment: A movement of material by a private parcel service.

values.label: House to house
values.comment: Cargo packed in a unit by the shipper at point of origin and unpacked by consignee at final destination.

values.label: House to terminal
values.comment: Cargo packed in a unit by the shipper at point of origin and unpacked at the carrier's inland facility between the ship's point of discharge and the final destination.

values.label: House to pier
values.comment: Cargo packed in a unit by the shipper at point of origin and unpacked by carrier at ship's point of discharge (pier).

values.label: Air charter
values.comment: A movement of material by chartered aircraft.

values.label: Air express
values.comment: A movement of material by air express service.

values.label: Geographic grouped transport
values.comment: A movement of material from multiple origins to a single destination utilizing a single carrier and a single freight bill.

values.label: Less than truck load
values.comment: A movement of material on a truck that is not full.

values.label: Pooled piggyback
values.comment: A movement of material by a trailer on a railcar.

values.label: Consignee transportation provided
values.comment: A movement of material transported by the consignee.

values.label: Rail
values.comment: A movement of material to the consignee via rail.

values.label: Terminal to house
values.comment: Cargo packed in a unit at a carrier's inland facility between point of origin and the ship's point of loading and unpacked by consignee at the final destination.

values.label: Terminal to terminal
values.comment: Cargo packed in a unit at a carrier's inland facility between point of origin and the ship's point of loading and unpacked at a carrier's inland facility between ship's point of discharge and final destination.

values.label: Terminal to pier
values.comment: Cargo packed in a unit at a carrier's inland facility between point of origin and ship's point of loading and unpacked by carrier at ship's point of discharge (pier).

values.label: Pier to house
values.comment: Cargo packed in a unit at ship's point of loading and unpacked by consignee at final destination.

values.label: Pier to terminal
values.comment: Cargo packed in a unit at ship's point of loading and unpacked at a carrier's inland facility between ship's point of discharge and final destination.

values.label: Pier to pier
values.comment: Cargo packed in a unit at ship's point of loading and unpacked by carrier at ship's point of discharge (pier).

values.label: Station to station
values.comment: The consignment is moving from one container freight station to another container freight station.

values.label: House to warehouse
values.comment: The consignment is moving from the premises of the shipper to a warehouse.

values.label: Warehouse to house
values.comment: The consignment is moving from a warehouse to the premises of the consignee.

values.label: Station to house
values.comment: The cargo is moving from a container freight station to the premises of the consignee.

values.label: Geographic grouped transport, multiple origins, multiple destinations
values.comment: A movement of material from multiple origins to multiple destinations using a single carrier and a single freight bill.

values.label: Geographic grouped transport, multiple origins, single destination
values.comment: A movement of material from multiple origins to a single destination utilizing a single carrier and a single freight bill.

values.label: Geographic receiving
values.comment: A collection of shipments that involve a single origin, multiple destinations, and a single trailer, and are paid under a single freight bill.
